name: letonikabc
description: Tīmekļa vietne, kurā lietotājs lejupielādē teksta failu no letonika.lv vietnes un izmanto kā alternatīvu lasītāvu

scripts.dev: wasm-pack build crates/app --debug --target web && bun vite
scripts.build: bun run pack-wasm && bun vite build
scripts.preview: bun run build && bun vite preview
scripts.extract: bun run build && wasm2wat crates/app/pkg/app_bg.wasm -o crates/app/pkg/release.wat
scripts.pack-wasm: cargo build -r && wasm-bindgen target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/app.wasm --out-dir crates/app/pkg --target web && bun run opt

author: robertpakalns
